Text: could you please upload in 1080p for this movie, this one is pure collector item, and more of ice age annimations, thanks for your great works again.

Whoever downsized the BluRay source with such a low bitrate has defeated the entire purpose of this movie being released in BluRay to begin with.

Encode at a much higher bitrate in 1080p please if you're going to upload at all. The HDTV Rip quality is better than this version, guys. Skip it and wait for a proper encode.

Unless someone's kind enough to give me the BluRay disc source files, then I'll happily encode this to perfection ;)
